description.0: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.

0.0: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a <cryo>60%</cryo> chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to <cryo>80%</cryo> of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to <cryo>200%</cryo> of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.
